children.name: Monaural
children.desc: Use a single microphone. Most difficult.

children.name: Binaural
children.desc: Use two microphones, replicating human hearing.

children.name: Array
children.desc: Use a microphone array, giving maximum spacial context.

children.name: Spectral Subtraction
children.desc: Simplest to implement. Noise is estimated and subtracted in the frequency domain.

children.name: Statistical Models
children.desc: Uses statistical models to evaluate maximum-likelihood estimation of speech.

children.name: Subspace Analysis
children.desc: Reduce the dimensionality and analyse lower dimension features to estimate speech.

children.name: Binary Masking
children.desc: The spectral components are estimated as 'speech' or 'non-speech'.
